title: Bloomberg Markets: Olo Aids Amazon in Restaurant Food Delivery
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Olo Aids Amazon in Restaurant Food Delivery
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Noah Glass\u0010CEO\u0010Olo\u0010Discussing Amazon teaming up with Olo, which provides digital order and pay technology to 200 restaurant brands with about 40,000 U.S. locations, potentially giving Amazon access to a slew of delivery orders.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
